TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Miwcu_a_kamu, title = Miwcu_a_kamu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miwcu_a_kamu} }

S.FORM: tada kamu nu Miwcu u Miwyi, nu Miwyew-yicu a nu Miwyian. nasisulit ku Miwyi, nika malawpes tu. aydaay nu Cunkuo a Miwcu, niyalaan tu sasulitan namakayda i Cunkuo nakamuan a kaydaan itini i caysiw-limnem a mihcaan caysep a bulat nu Cunkuo satabakiay nu nakamuan a kitidaan tu Cunkuo satabakiay nu tuluay a Miwyian tu natanga han sisulit tu nakamuan, u tunem a sasulitan tu Latingu ku sangihaan tu tadakamu, yunmu atu ngalngal. . caay namin kalecad ku nika utiihay nu sasakamuen tu Miwyi, sadayumen ku nakamuan, masasulalitu tu tada kamun nu layak a kitidaan, tadakamu sinikadayuman tu atu mapatadu nu layak a nakamuan tada micidek tu. .

tada kamo no Miwco o Miwyi, no Miwyew-yico a no Miwyian. nasisolit ko Miwyi, nika malawpes to. aydaay no Conkoo a Miwco, niyalaan to sasolitan namakayda i Conkoo nakamoan a kaydaan itini i caysiw-limnem a mihcaan caysep a bolat no Conkoo satabakiay no nakamoan a kitidaan to Conkoo satabakiay no toloay a Miwyian to natanga han sisolit to nakamoan, o tonem a sasolitan to Latingo ko sangihaan to tadakamo, yonmo ato ngalngal. . caay namin kalecad ko nika otiihay no sasakamoen to Miwyi, sadayomen ko nakamoan, masasolalito to tada kamon no layak a kitidaan, tadakamo sinikadayoman to ato mapatado no layak a nakamoan tada micidek to. .
